sections.heading: Repealed.Section 46-3-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 33-5-18, enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 239, § 1; repealed by Laws 2001, ch. 113, § 604.

Repeals.— Laws 2001, ch. 113, § 604 repealed 46-3-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 239, § 1, relating to definitions, effective July 1, 2001. For provisions of former section,seethe 2000 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present comparable provisions,seeChapter 46, Article 3A NMSA 1978.
